DOC.detailed_description: Recruitment - Non diabetic participant recruit within National University Ireland , Galway student staff community . Diabetic patient recruit University College Hospital , Galway collaboration hospital consultant . Test- day - They undergo two separate , identical simultaneous Oral Glucose Tolerance test 13C-glucose breath test two separate occasion overnight fast 12 hour start 8pm . On arrival heart rate , blood pressure , height weight record . Following rest period 10 minute , sample obtain fast glucose breath enrichment value ( = -20 -10mins ) . At = 0 min , participant consume standard glucose solution . This glucose solution consist 150mg 13C-glucose , 74.85g glucose 200ml water 25ml orange flavoring . Breath sample obtain immediately consumption test solution repeat every 15 min 4-h interval . Blood glucose concentration take every 15 min start = 15 min , 2-h interval every 30 min another 2-h interval . Participants remain rest throughout study . Sample size assessment - Target recruitment 40 non-diabetics 40 diabetic participant . This study use Student 's t-test determine difference , otherwise , glucose oxidation breath 13CO2 , 2 different group individual . With power arbitrarily set 0.8 , effect size 1.21 reduction breath , Alpha set 0.01 final number 35 participant require group . The n=40 group set allow 5 participant drop group Dillon et al ( 2009 ) .
